title: Love Will Find a Way
description: Laureen is heartbroken. At gaya ng karaniwang ginagawa ng mga taong sawi sa pag-ibig, she tries to ease the pain of an ugly breakup by amusing herself in a bar, where she meets Luigi, a certified guwapo at playboy. He singles her out from the crowd and instantly likes her. The attraction soon turns into mutual dislike as they spend more time together.Sinumpa ni Laureen sa sarili na hinding-hindi na siya magbubulagbulagan pagdating sa pag-ibig. But another chance encounter with Luigi will make her reconsider if itâ€™s a smart decision to keep her heart safe, or follow it yet again.
author: iloveaxclu
